author: abdel.stark
content:
<@!301186049323958275> I started the first EIP for RPC endpoints impacted by EIP-1559. This one is for eth_getBlockByHash endpoint. Since this is my first EIP can you have a look at it and tell me if it sounds good please ?
https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/3041

author: sky.cactus
content: <@!574864862338088960> Will do, though probably not until tomorrow (it is getting late here).

author: abdel.stark
content: Sure, no worries it is not urgent. Thanks.

author: sky.cactus
content: Left a couple easy pointers that will be required.

author: abdel.stark
content: Should i put the eth magician discussion link in 1559-fee-market channel ?

author: timbeiko
content: <@!574864862338088960> I think you should probably just open another thread (perhaps one for all of the API changes vs. one per each) to keep it more focused on the RPC changes vs. 1559 as a whole.

author: abdel.stark
content: Ok. Otherwise maybe the Eth magician discussion is enough. I don't think the topic is controversial

author: sky.cactus
content: It is good to have a consolidated place to discuss, so I recommend separate discussion links for each EIP  <@574864862338088960>.

author: sky.cactus
content: The cost is pretty low once you have a magicians account.  :)
